body: OK. Two things here you need to do: 1. Reinsert the component. There were changes in the number of inputs that compels you to do that. 2. Notice that you didn't create a zone. You connected only the surface to the _HBObjects input. See inage for those issues addressed and working. -A.[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/*R7YIBaka1vnmy9YLTVraNBhznPoGwSy4CCdLdaYyngqE0Qv8hScsuZM7acQeM8fOODtFiMi4TUnCF8EqvJHyCLkcNm4s1RZ/Capture.JPG)
